column3: Going to close as "Up for Grabs". @dongcarl You might be interested in having a look here.
Believe https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16563 removes the need for this. If so, "up for grabs" label should be removed.
Drop all these empty lines surrounding single code lines. Applies throughout this PR :-)
Should be unsigned to match what `CMedianFilter` expects?\n\nApplies for all `int capacity` in this file.
Make the implicit conversion from `unsigned int` to `unsigned char` explicit here.\n\nApplies for all `CNetAddr addr = UtilBuildAddress(…, sample);` in this file.
Why `assert(…)` and not `BOOST_CHECK(…)`? Applies throughout this PR.
Drop one of the newlines. Applies for all double newlines in this PR.
Drop empty line at end of block.
